themes: Opposition to funding for for-profit and non-arts organizations
Focus on artistic merit and community service
key_phrases: Align with best practices such as Texas Commission on the Arts
remove the questions that have nothing to do with artistic practice, production history, budget and other tangibles

barriers_identified: Application questions unrelated to artistic practice, production history, or budget

solutions_proposed: Align with best practices such as Texas Commission on the Arts
Center art and service to the community
